text: Just starting first project. I've building modules in my sandbox account since March.  Not using local dev currently. What approach do people use for version control and backup? Any tips to keep it easy and simple?

Hey Jon, I know many folks are using Git for version control. We have a tutorial up regarding <https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/github-integration|Setting up continuous integration with a GitHub repository using GitHub Actions> that may point you in the right direction.
Some additional tips for setting up a good workflow <https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/creating-an-efficient-development-workflow>
VS Code + GitHub gets my vote
